Interface InconsistencyState

edu.kit.kastel.informalin.framework.configuration.IConfigurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
InconsistencyStateImpl
public interface InconsistencyState extends edu.kit.kastel.informalin.framework.configuration.IConfigurable
Inconsistency state holding data and information about inconsistency.
